name: Forgotten Memories: Alternate Realities
summary:
Forgotten Memories is a third person Psychological Survival Horror game combining exploration, reflection, puzzles, action and survival where the gameplay is focused on fear mechanics.A true spiritual successor of the greatest horrific games from the 90's.
Forgotten Memories is a classic survival horror game.

Forgotten Memories combines deep psychological story, beautifully rendered environments, and smooth gameplay action into a fantastic horror experience you will never forget.
